strapiPost.title: Lady Hogs Secure Big Win Over Baylor (83-78)
strapiPost.content:
No. 16 Arkansas toppled the No. 4 Baylor Bears, 83-78, in Bud Walton Arena on Sunday Night.

  • This was a sensational top-five win for the Hogs, the first since 2003. The win was also the first since 1996 against a defending national championship team.
  • Amber Ramirez, senior guard, was the clear standout of the game, putting up a team record of 23 points, 16 of those in the last half. -Arkansas Razorback Athletics
  • Arkansas will be on the road Wednesday to face SMU in Dallas at 7pm CT.
